meanings.definition: Opposed to the desegregation of schools.
meanings.sent1: The antidesegregation group protested outside the school.
meanings.sent2: Her antidesegregation views clashed with the school's policies.
meanings.sent3: The antidesegregation activists wore matching t-shirts to the rally.
meanings.sent4: His stubborn antidesegregation stance caused tension in the community.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of the antidesegregation sign stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A person or group that actively works against desegregation efforts.
meanings.sent1: The antidesegregation was vocal during the town hall meeting.
meanings.sent2: She became known as an antidesegregation in the local community.
meanings.sent3: The antidesegregation brought cookies to the protest for everyone.
meanings.sent4: The antidesegregation's actions spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The determined antidesegregation fought for what they believed in.
